title: Biological Age Calculator
description: Calculate your biological age based on lifestyle factors and biomarkers

results.title: Your Results

interpretation.younger: Your biological age is lower than your chronological age, suggesting your body is aging slower than average.
interpretation.same: Your biological age matches your chronological age, suggesting your body is aging at an average rate.
interpretation.older: Your biological age is higher than your chronological age, suggesting your body is aging faster than average.

recommendations.title: Recommendations to Improve Your Biological Age
recommendations.sleep: Optimize your sleep duration and quality
recommendations.diet: Improve your diet quality with more whole foods

results.disclaimer: This calculator provides an estimate based on available information. For a more accurate assessment, consult with a healthcare professional.
